p: The ability of samples to inhibit lipid peroxidation was evaluated by using the β-carotene bleaching test [ 21]. The aqueous extracts (from 2.5 to 100 μg/mL) were mixed with linoleic, Tween 20 acid and β-carotene solution. The absorbance was read at t = 0, and after 30 and 60 min of incubation at 470 nm.
